channel.title: The OzSpot
channel.description: The OzSpot is GameSpot AU's weekly gaming podcast. Join hosts Laura, Dan, Ed, Randy, and Jess as they discuss the latest in gaming news. Plus: special guests, exclusive game previews, and more!
channel.itunes:author: GameSpot AU
channel.itunes:subtitle: The OzSpot
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to the GameSpot AU Podcast, our regular audio show in which we recap the biggest news and trends in the gaming industry over the past couple of weeks and talk to people in the industry about whatâ€™s happening in their world.

item.title: OzSpot 29/05/12
item.itunes:author: The OzSpot
item.itunes:subtitle: OzSpot 29/05/12
item.itunes:summary: On this week's show we have a debate about video game advertising, talk about GAME Australia layoffs and store closures, and look at why Kingdoms of Amalur developer 38 Studios closed last week. Tune in!
item.description: On this week's show we have a debate about video game advertising, talk about GAME Australia layoffs and store closures, and look at why Kingdoms of Amalur developer 38 Studios closed last week. Tune in!
item.author: laura.parker@cbsinteractive.com (GameSpot AU)

item.title: OzSpot 22/05/12
item.itunes:author: The OzSpot
item.itunes:subtitle: OzSpot 22/05/12
item.itunes:summary: This week we discuss Australian game retailers grey importing stock, EA courting indie developers, and differing views from two major developers on the future of the next generation of games. Tune in!
item.description: This week we discuss Australian game retailers grey importing stock, EA courting indie developers, and differing views from two major developers on the future of the next generation of games. Tune in!
item.author: laura.parker@cbsinteractive.com (GameSpot AU)

item.title: OzSpot 15/05/12
item.itunes:author: The OzSpot
item.itunes:subtitle: OzSpot 15/05/12
item.itunes:summary: This week on the show we invite special guest Frank Simon, senior managing producer at Sony Computer Entertainment America, to talk to us about the upcoming VITA title Resistance: Burning Skies as well as broader industry issues such as handhelds vs. mobile, innovation, PS4 rumours, and more. Tune in!
item.description: This week on the show we invite special guest Frank Simon, senior managing producer at Sony Computer Entertainment America, to talk to us about the upcoming VITA title Resistance: Burning Skies as well as broader industry issues such as handhelds vs. mobile, innovation, PS4 rumours, and more. Tune in!
item.author: laura.parker@cbsinteractive.com (GameSpot AU)

item.title: OzSpot 08/05/12
item.itunes:author: The OzSpot
item.itunes:subtitle: OzSpot 08/05/12
item.itunes:summary: On this week's show we look at what the industry's top analysts think about next-gen consoles blocking used games; we throw around the idea of owning consoles on a monthly plan; plus: comparing the 3DS with the Vita--how is the latter measuring up? All this and more!
item.description: On this week's show we look at what the industry's top analysts think about next-gen consoles blocking used games; we throw around the idea of owning consoles on a monthly plan; plus: comparing the 3DS with the Vita--how is the latter measuring up? All this and more!
item.author: laura.parker@cbsinteractive.com (GameSpot AU)

item.title: The OzSpot 01/05/12
item.itunes:author: The OzSpot
item.itunes:subtitle: The OzSpot 01/05/12
item.itunes:summary: On this week's show: Koz's farewell message, Halo live-action series, Mikami's new survival horror game, and more! Plus: Dan tells us his impressions of God of War's new multiplayer mode.
item.description: On this week's show: Koz's farewell message, Halo live-action series, Mikami's new survival horror game, and more! Plus: Dan tells us his impressions of God of War's new multiplayer mode.
item.author: laura.parker@cbsinteractive.com (GameSpot AU)

item.title: The OzSpot 24/04/12
item.itunes:author: The OzSpot
item.itunes:subtitle: The OzSpot 24/04/12
item.itunes:summary: This week we look at the growth of games in the eyes of the mainstream press; the author suing Ubisoft over the plot of Assassin's Creed; new God of War game AND a soon-to-be-announced new Call of Duty game; and the parliamentary inquiry that could help lower the prices of video games in Australia. Tune in!
item.description: This week we look at the growth of games in the eyes of the mainstream press; the author suing Ubisoft over the plot of Assassin's Creed; new God of War game AND a soon-to-be-announced new Call of Duty game; and the parliamentary inquiry that could help lower the prices of video games in Australia. Tune in!
item.author: laura.parker@cbsinteractive.com (GameSpot AU)
